thread.title: Idiot ISIS 'bomb expert' blows himself up while planting explosives
thread.title_full: Idiot ISIS 'bomb expert' blows himself up while planting explosives

title: Idiot ISIS 'bomb expert' blows himself up while planting explosives
text:
GETTY TOOL: ISIS 'bomb expert' blows himself up 
The militant, nicknamed Abu Abdullah, was rigging a bomb in southern Mosul for coalition forces when the terror fool detonated it himself. 
A security source confirmed Abdullah had been planting a road bomb in Shirqat, which was liberated from the sick terror group last year. 
He added that Abdullah was a second-tier leader in the group and in a large dose of irony was known as being a bomb expert. 
Abdullah's speciality was booby-trapping buildings to cover the sick-group's retreat out of Mosul as US led-coalition troops look to takeover their stronghold. 
He is also said to have taken part in bombings on the coalition over the past few months. 
Morale in the terror will now be at an all-time low after the death of another senior official. On patrol with the Iraqi forces driving ISIS terrorists from Mosul Wednesday, 18th January 2017 The city of Mosul has been an ISIS stronghold since they took control of the city in January 2014. The Iraqi army claim to have taken it back, and defeated the Islamist terrorists. 1 / 12 AFP/Getty Images CTS soldiers fatigued from battle. 
Even ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi was badly wounded after a precision US airstrike targeted his headquarters. 
GETTY WORK BEGINS: Civilians are moving back to Mosul 
The sick ISIS leader is also becoming dismayed at the lack of commitment from Brit jihadis, telling them to strap on a suicide vest or go home.
